Package com.i2group.apollo.alertingapi

Contains a custom extension point relating to alerting.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAlert An alert in the Intelligence Analysis Platform.
IAlertDeliveryMechanism Information about a mechanism for delivering an alert.
IAlertDispatcher A dispatcher that sends Intelligence Analysis Platform alerts using custom delivery mechanisms.
IItemChangedAlert An alert in the Intelligence Analysis Platform that is generated when an Item changes.
ILinkCreatedAlert An alert in the Intelligence Analysis Platform that is generated when a Link is created.
IRepositoryAlert An alert in the Intelligence Analysis Platform that is generated in response to a change in the Analysis Repository.
ISetAmendedAlert An alert in the Intelligence Analysis Platform that is generated when the contents of a set changes.
 

Package com.i2group.apollo.alertingapi Description

Contains a custom extension point relating to alerting.

The interfaces in this package permit individual deployments to send alerts using custom delivery mechanisms, such as email or SMS systems.

Since:
3.0
